entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:13 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 12:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 10:07 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning early in the morning then changing to periods of rain near noon. Freezing rain inland in the morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. Forecast issued 10:07 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle in the evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 10:07 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
